links.title: Tesla Inc (TSLA) Working With Semi Truck Buyers For On-Site Charging Stations
links.description: TSLA - Amid high early demand for its electric semi trucks, Tesla is reportedly working with buyers to put charging stations in their facilities. Tesla Inc (NASDAQ:TSLA) is still years away from delivering its first electric semi trucks to customers, but it's already thinking ahead about how it's going to deliver power to all those vehicles.
